headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: *.openstreetmap.org *.arcgisonline.com staticmap.openstreetmap.de; connect-src 'self' *.openstreetmap.org *.arcgisonline.com overpass-api.de; font-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; form-action 'self';
